name: flow3r-webflasher
description: Web flasher tool for the flow3r Badge
author: flow3r Devs

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && cp -r static/* dist/ && npx esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --loader:.ts=ts --target=chrome115 --outfile=dist/bundle.js
scripts.copy_firmware: cp ../recovery/build/bootloader/bootloader.bin dist/api/bootloader.bin && cp ../recovery/build/partition_table/partition-table.bin dist/api/partition-table.bin && cp ../recovery/build/flow3r-recovery.bin dist/api/flow3r-recovery.bin && cp ../build/flow3r.bin dist/api/flow3r.bin
